params.name: image
params.description: The pipeline handles three types of images:A string containing a http link pointing to an imageA string containing a local path to an imageAn image loaded in PIL directly

params.name: candidate_labels
params.description: The candidate labels for this image. They will be formatted using hypothesis_template.

params.name: hypothesis_template
params.description: The format used in conjunction with candidate_labels to attempt the image classification byreplacing the placeholder with the candidate_labels. Pass {} if candidate_labels arealready formatted.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The maximum time in seconds to wait for fetching images from the web. If None, no timeout is set andthe call may block forever.
